message.body: Cait! 1. I think azeem is autistic. He is the autism awareness representative for Asia. 2. I am still suck! Ugh. It must not be food poisoning after all. I am at the doctor today at the mass art infirmary. Hopefully everything will get sorted out in a few hours. Will keep you updated. Would still like to see you tonight.

Azeem autistic, interesting, hmmm. The language and cultural barrier would never lead me to that conclusion on my own. Get better Sophie! I'm just organizing my room some more, I'm up what whatever if you get better.
And if you don't be better, I can always bring you some soup!!
Dude it's on his business card. Also you are sweet
